problem_text_cn: 如图,四边形ABCD为⊙O的内接四边形．延长AB与DC相交于点G,AO⊥CD,垂足为E,连接BD,∠GBC=50°,则∠DBC的度数为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the quadrilateral ABCD is the inscribed quadrilateral of ⊙O. Extend AB and intersect DC at point G, AO ⊥ CD, the vertical foot is E, connect BD, ∠GBC = N_0, then the degree of ∠DBC is ()
raw_answer:
解:如图,∵A、B、D、C四点共圆,∴∠GBC=∠ADC=50°,∵AE⊥CD,∴∠AED=90°,∴∠EAD=90°-50°=40°,
延长AE交⊙O于点M,∵AO⊥CD,∴⁀{CM}=⁀{DM},∴∠DBC=2∠EAD=80°．
故选:C．
raw_comment: 本题考查了四点共圆的性质:圆内接四边形的任意一个外角等于它的内对角,还考查了垂径定理的应用,属于基础题．
